channel.title: Syntax Highlighter for Windows Live Writer
channel.description: Well, the benefits of the Live Writer SDK are already coming true for me.  One of my bug-bears with BlogJet was to copy/paste in code samples was pretty tricky.  I ended up evolving a manual process of visiting the excellent CodeHTMLer...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Wes+00:00
item.description: Just in case you are interested and prefer CodeHtmler, there is a LiveWriter plugin for it http://puzzleware.net/download.aspx?file=/codehtmler/codehtmler.livewriterplugin.zip.
item.dc:creator: Wes
